trait.name: Flyby
entries: The devil doesn't provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks, using Infernal Fork and Tail Spine in any combination.

action.name: Infernal Fork
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Fire damage.

action.name: Tail Spine
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 20/80 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Fire damage.
